code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Nav from'./Nav';import'./Cart.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cart(){const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const[totalPrice,setTotalPrice]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const updatedCart=[...cart];updatedCart.splice(index,1);setCart(updatedCart);localStorage.setItem('cart',JSON.stringify(updatedCart));updateTotalPrice(updatedCart);};const updateTotalPrice=cartItems=>{const updatedCart=cart.map(item=>{if(item.id===id){return{...item,quantity:item.quantity+1};}return updatedCart=cart.map(item=>{if(item.id===id&&item.quantity>1){return{...item,quantity:item.quantity-1};}return item;});setCart(updatedCart);localStorage.setItem('cart',JSON.stringify(updatedCart));updateTotalPrice(updatedCart);};const placeOrder=()=>{if(cart.length>0){const confirmation=window.confirm("Your order is placed!");if(confirmation){setCart([]);setTotalPrice(0);localStorage.removeItem('cart');}}else{alert("Your cart is
